results.content:
I was looking for a front-end web development course and this course not only taught me how to develop websites, but also web design which is very valuable especially in case I would be freelancing one day. 
There were only a couple things I struggled to make work (using PHP locally, and some code that was broken on my end), but I found workarounds in QA forums so it wasn't a big deal. 
SPOILER alert: Brad is a likeable fella. He will keep you motivated.
results.content_html:
I was looking for a front-end web development course and this course not only taught me how to develop websites, but also web design which is very valuable especially in case I would be freelancing one day.
There were only a couple things I struggled to make work (using PHP locally, and some code that was broken on my end), but I found workarounds in QA forums so it wasn't a big deal.
SPOILER alert: Brad is a likeable fella. He will keep you motivated.

results.content: Brad has been an excellent instructor. His understanding of the material and experience gives him the ability to present concepts and lessons in a personable way with boyish charm. My only criticism is his adherence to colour and favourite, instead of color and favorite.
results.content_html: Brad has been an excellent instructor. His understanding of the material and experience gives him the ability to present concepts and lessons in a personable way with boyish charm. My only criticism is his adherence to colour and favourite, instead of color and favorite.

results.content:
Originally, I took this course in order to help demysify and relearn some of the aspects used with converting a Design and completing the final Developement phase. In the past I found myself becomming complacent using tools like Dreamweaver and have eventually shied away from coding since the actual design and finished look is way more inspiring to me. However, I eventually realized that I really needed to better understand this process.

It is great that Brad has so much knowledge in the entire realm of Website building that he can actually teach it for 30+ hours! 

Since completing this course, I will definitely revisit from time to time (especially if I get stuck on a project!).

This is the most inclusive and "all incompassing course" that I have found so far regarding Website building and really provides a full picture of the entire process!

results.content: There were some interesting parts, the design and CSS topics were quite helpful, but overall the course didn't go in much depth concerning web development.
results.content_html: There were some interesting parts, the design and CSS topics were quite helpful, but overall the course didn't go in much depth concerning web development.

results.content: The course is really very amazing. I've learned a lot from this course and if anyone wants to learn about web designing and web development, I will definitely recommend them for this Brad Hussy's Ultimate Web Designer & Web Development course.
results.content_html: The course is really very amazing. I've learned a lot from this course and if anyone wants to learn about web designing and web development, I will definitely recommend them for this Brad Hussy's Ultimate Web Designer & Web Development course.
